about_the_game:
Continue the war behind enemy lines with the Agent pack, outfitting your resistance fighters with new gear for your covert operations.

The Agent Pack contains:
New Special Ops Map – “Radar”
Two new Special Ops missions:
• Over Hill Under Hill
• Make Every Kill Count
New Weapon:
• Winchester 1912
New Weapon Variant
• Beretta “Compact”
New Clothing Set
• Female Resistance “Agent”
detailed_description:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850, 2 GB or Intel Arc A380, 4 GB
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low 1080p @ 30 FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600XT
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 97 0, 4 GB or AMD Radeon R9 290X, 4 GB or Intel Arc A750, 8 GB
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: High 1080p @ 60 FPS

short_description: Continue the war behind enemy lines with the Agent pack, outfitting your resistance fighters with new gear for your covert operations.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
